name: Generic Client Onboarding
description: Standard onboarding checklist for all new clients. Covers engagement confirmation, contact verification, billing arrangements, and engagement letter.

items.name: Confirm client engagement
items.description: Confirm that the client has formally agreed to engage the firm's services.

items.name: Verify contact details
items.description: Verify the client's contact information including email, phone, and address.

items.name: Confirm billing arrangements
items.description: Confirm the agreed billing rate, payment terms, and invoicing details.

items.name: Upload signed engagement letter
items.description: Obtain and upload the signed engagement letter from the client.
